mapper.select: SELECT order_detail.id AS 'id', order_detail.order_id AS 'order', order_detail.goods_id AS 'goods', order_detail.goods_count AS 'count', order_detail.goods_price AS 'price' FROM order_detail WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT order_detail.id AS 'id', order_detail.order_id AS 'order', order_detail.goods_id AS 'goods', order_detail.goods_count AS 'count', order_detail.goods_price AS 'price' FROM order_detail
